data.title: Star tech investor Glen Kacher on Facebook: "It's a real crisis"
data.text: Light Street's Glen Kacher sits down with CNBC's Leslie Picker at the Goldman Sachs Tech Conference in San Francisco to discuss the investment opportunities in tech, including Softbank and Amazon.

data.title: Tech stocks make comeback since December lows
data.text: CNBC's Seema Mody breaks down the stocks and news that are moving the markets.

data.title: Facebook co-founder: Amazon not guaranteeing you any privacy..
data.text: Sean Parker, chairman of The Parker Foundation, discusses big tech's data privacy problem.
